<installation version="1.0">
<!-- The info section. The meaning of the tags should be natural ... --> <info> <appname>CSM UPT</appname> <appversion>@{csm.version}</appversion> <authors> <author name="NCI CBIIT" email=""/> </authors> <url>https://cabig.nci.nih.gov/tools/CSM</url> <javaversion>1.6</javaversion> </info>
<!-- The gui preferences indication. Sets the installer window to 640x480. It will not be able to change the size. --> <guiprefs width="1024" height="768" resizable="yes"> <modifier key="useButtonIcons" value="no"/> <modifier key="useLabelIcons" value="no"/> <modifier key="allYGap" value="3"/> <modifier key="layoutAnchor" value="NORTHWEST"/> <modifier key="useHeadingPanel" value="yes"/> <modifier key="headingLineCount" value="1"/> <modifier key="headingFontSize" value="1.5"/> <modifier key="headingBackgroundColor" value="0x00ffffff"/> <modifier key="headingPanelCounter" value="text"/> <modifier key="headingPanelCounterPos" value="inHeading"/> </guiprefs>
<!-- Need to define ant properties we want to use during install as variables --> <variables>
<variable name="app.name" value="@{app.name}"/> <variable name="installer.dir" value="@{installer.dir}"/> <variable name="tomcat.binaries.relative.dir" value="@{tomcat.binaries.relative.dir}"/> <variable name="jboss.binaries.relative.dir" value="@{jboss.binaries.relative.dir}"/> </variables>
<!-- The locale section. Asks here to include the English and French langpacks. --> <locale> <langpack iso3="eng"> <str id="AntAction.core" txt="Proceeding of ANT-activities"/> <str id="AntAction.install" txt="Revision of archives"/> </langpack> </locale>
<conditions> <condition type="variable" id="install"> <name>setup.type</name> <value>install</value> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="upgrade"> <name>setup.type</name> <value>upgrade</value> </condition> <condition type="java" id="installonwindows"> <java> <class>com.izforge.izpack.util.OsVersion</class> <field>IS_WINDOWS</field> </java> <returnvalue type="boolean">true</returnvalue> </condition> <condition type="java" id="installonlinux"> <java> <class>com.izforge.izpack.util.OsVersion</class> <field>IS_LINUX</field> </java> <returnvalue type="boolean">true</returnvalue> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="ldap.setup"> <name>authentication.type</name> <value>ldap</value> </condition>
<condition type="variable" id="ldaps.setup"> <name>authentication.type</name> <value>ldaps</value> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="db.setup"> <name>authentication.type</name> <value>db</value> </condition>
<!-- UPT Installation Central or non-central --> <condition type="variable" id="central.installation"> <name>installation.type</name> <value>central</value> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="noncentral.installation"> <name>installation.type</name> <value>noncentral</value> </condition>
<!-- UPT Installation non-central - UPT 31,32,40,41,42 installed?--> <condition type="variable" id="install.upt45"> <name>upt.45.installed</name> <value>true</value> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="install.upt42"> <name>upt.42.installed</name> <value>false</value> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="install.upt41"> <name>upt.41.installed</name> <value>false</value> </condition>
<!-- Recreate Schema - central,31,32,40,41,42 ? --> <condition type="variable" id="recreate.schema.upt45"> <name>upt.45.database.re-create</name> <value>true</value> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="recreate.schema.upt42"> <name>upt.42.database.re-create</name> <value>false</value> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="recreate.schema.upt41"> <name>upt.41.database.re-create</name> <value>false</value> </condition>
<!-- Container selection --> <condition type="variable" id="container.all"> <name>install.selection</name> <value>install.all</value> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="container.jboss"> <name>install.selection</name> <value>install.jboss</value> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="container.tomcat"> <name>install.selection</name> <value>install.tomcat</value> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="container.database"> <name>install.selection</name> <value>install.database</value> </condition>
</conditions> <!-- Identify your build targets for each of the contaiers for both install and upgrade --> <dynamicvariables> <variable name="build.file.target" value="install" condition="install+container.all" /> <variable name="build.file.target" value="install:jboss" condition="install+container.jboss" /> <variable name="build.file.target" value="install:tomcat" condition="install+container.tomcat" /> <variable name="build.file.target" value="install:database" condition="install+container.database" /> <variable name="build.file.target" value="upgrade" condition="upgrade" /> <variable name="build.file.target" value="upgrade:jboss" condition="upgrade+container.jboss" /> <variable name="build.file.target" value="upgrade:database" condition="upgrade+container.database" />
<!-- conditionals for containers not chosen --> <variable name="jboss.relative.path" value="jboss.binaries.relative.dir" condition="container.database|container.tomcat"/> <variable name="jboss.server.hostname" value="" condition="container.database|container.tomcat"/> <variable name="jboss.web.user" value="" condition="container.database|container.tomcat"/> <variable name="jboss.web.password" value="" condition="container.database|container.tomcat"/> <variable name="jboss.server.ports.name" value="" condition="container.database|container.tomcat"/> <variable name="jboss.server.jndi.port" value="" condition="container.database|container.tomcat"/>

<variable name="upt.central.authentication.type" value="ldaps" condition="ldaps.setup"/> <variable name="upt.central.authentication.type" value="ldap" condition="ldap.setup"/> <variable name="upt.central.authentication.type" value="db" condition="db.setup"/>

<variable name="installation.type" value="central" condition="central.installation"/> <variable name="installation.type" value="noncentral" condition="noncentral.installation"/>

<!-- The resources section. The ids must be these ones if you want to use the LicencePanel and/or the InfoPanel. --> <resources> <res id="Installer.image" src="@{this.dir}/logotype.png"/> <res id="AntActionsSpec.xml" src="@{this.dir}/antActionSpec.xml" /> <res id="HTMLLicencePanel.licence" src="@{this.dir}/Licence.html"/> <res id="InfoPanel.info" src="@{this.dir}/Readme.txt"/> <res id="userInputSpec.xml" src="@{this.dir}/userInputSpec.xml" /> <res id="CustomActionsLang.xml_eng" src="@{this.dir}/custom_eng.xml"/> <res id="UserPathPanel.dir.windows" src="@{this.dir}/windir.txt"/> <res id="UserPathPanel.dir.linux" src="@{this.dir}/linuxdir.txt" /> </resources>
<!-- The panels section. We indicate here which panels we want to use. The order will be respected. <panel classname="PacksPanel" id="myuserinput" condition="pack2selected" /> --> <panels> <panel classname="HelloPanel"> <help iso3="eng" src="@{this.dir}/Help.html" /> </panel> <panel classname="InfoPanel"> <help iso3="eng" src="@{this.dir}/Help.html" /> </panel> <panel classname="HTMLLicencePanel"> <help iso3="eng" src="@{this.dir}/Help.html" /> </panel> <panel classname="UserInputPanel" id="UserInputPanel.0" > <help iso3="eng" src="@{this.dir}/Help.html" /> </panel> <!-- Typical or Custom--> <panel classname="UserInputPanel" id="UserInputPanel.1"> <help iso3="eng" src="@{this.dir}/Help.html" /> </panel>
<!-- Choose Path --> <panel classname="UserPathPanel" id="UserPathPanelInstallation" condition="install"> <help iso3="eng" src="@{this.dir}/Help.html" /> </panel> <!-- Component Selection --> <panel classname="UserInputPanel" id="UserInputPanel.2" > <help iso3="eng" src="@{this.dir}/Help.html" /> </panel>
<!-- Upgrade, specify app homes and read properties --> <panel classname="UserInputPanel" id="UserInputPanel.3" condition="upgrade"> <help iso3="eng" src="@{this.dir}/Help.html" /> </panel> <!-- Upgrade, read props <panel classname="UserInputPanel" id="UserInputPanel.4" condition="never"/> <panel classname="UserInputPanel" id="UserInputPanel.5" condition="never"/> <panel classname="UserInputPanel" id="UserInputPanel.6" condition="never"/> -->
<!-- Jboss Configuration --> <panel classname="UserInputPanel" id="UserInputPanel.4"> <help iso3="eng" src="@{this.dir}/Help.html" /> </panel> <!-- Jboss Continued --> <panel classname="UserInputPanel" id="UserInputPanel.5"> <help iso3="eng" src="@{this.dir}/Help.html" /> </panel> <!-- Typical DB config--> <panel classname="UserInputPanel" id="UserInputPanel.6" > <help iso3="eng" src="@{this.dir}/Help.html" /> </panel> <!-- Choose Authentication Type --> <panel classname="UserInputPanel" id="UserInputPanel.7" condition="central.installation"> <help iso3="eng" src="@{this.dir}/Help.html" /> </panel>
<!-- Authentication LDAPS data entry --> <panel classname="UserInputPanel" id="UserInputPanel.8" condition="central.installation+ldaps.setup"> <help iso3="eng" src="@{this.dir}/Help.html" /> </panel> <!-- Authentication LDAP data entry --> <panel classname="UserInputPanel" id="UserInputPanel.9" condition="central.installation+ldap.setup"> <help iso3="eng" src="@{this.dir}/Help.html" /> </panel> <!-- Authentication DB Properties --> <panel classname="UserInputPanel" id="UserInputPanel.10" condition="db.setup"> <help iso3="eng" src="@{this.dir}/Help.html" /> </panel>
<!-- Installation Summary --> <panel classname="UserInputPanel" id="UserInputPanel.11" > <help iso3="eng" src="@{this.dir}/Help.html" /> </panel> <panel classname="InstallationGroupPanel"> <help iso3="eng" src="@{this.dir}/Help.html" /> </panel> <panel classname="ExtendedInstallPanel"> <help iso3="eng" src="@{this.dir}/Help.html" /> </panel> <panel classname="FinishPanel"/>
</panels>

<listener installer="ProgressBarInstallerListener"/>
<listener installer="AntActionInstallerListener" uninstaller="AntActionUninstallerListener" /> </listeners>
